column1: Local Foods////When it comes to the sandwiches though
column2: nothing compares to the crunchy chicken sandwich. Layers of chicken mixed with cheese
column4: and a ranch sauce help to create the perfect balance of flavor. Top all that with a perfectly toasted pretzel bun and you've got a winner. I have yet to meet someone who is not a fan of the crunchy chicken sandwich...but for those craving something without meat
column5: another one of my favorites is the truffled egg sandwich. It's provides a nice change of pace from the sandwiches with meat without sacrificing any flavor or taste.
